comments.content:
Ack! It says I'm Comic Sans and that I \*heart\* Papyrus. Apparently. the world splits into two groups: cold (Helvetica, American Typewriter and Stencil) and pathetic (Comic Sans, Papyrus, Mistral). I went back and changed one answer and wound up as Helvetica, though. This was not that entertaining.

---  
Nick Hladek
Kind of sad, but interesting to see it through an outside lens. Whatever.

I seems that the result of checking the "Must have at least a basic understanding of home made explosives" box is predictable.

-=®=-
